availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Erastus Volney Joice (San Francisco County, California, public notary)

body.p: San Francisco County, California, notary public. New York native. Married to Emeline S. Joice. Father of Emma H. Joice Townsend. Gentleman in San Francisco County, California, in 1852. Notary public in San Francisco in 1860. Employed Mary O'Connell as a servant in San Francisco in 1860.

ab.bibl:
California State Census of 1852, Population Schedules, San Francisco County, p. 427.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, California, San Francisco County, San Francisco District 6, p. 439.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, California, San Francisco County, San Francisco Ward 6, p. 99A.
San Francisco County Poll List (1866), Sacramento, Ca: California State Library, Sixth Ward Election District, p. 10.
"E. V. Joice," The San Francisco Call, (San Francisco, Ca.) Nov. 24, 1891, p. 8.
